summary: Implements a custom JSON decoding engine that extends the standard library decoder with enhanced error handling, duplicate key detection, null value checks, and precise source location tracking via Mark objects. It also offers a lightweight decoder variant that applies an object_hook to transform parsed dictionaries into domain-specific structures, along with several helper utilities for scanning and indexing JSON tokens.
business_intent: Enable reliable parsing of JSON configuration files within the Checkov security analysis platform, providing detailed diagnostics and positional information to facilitate accurate policy evaluation and reporting.
